outcome: Branch A: 'The Flickering Census' - BCI malfunctions reveal a second, shadow population overlapping with those earlier erased from watchlists. Panic and division mount as the system’s true toll surfaces, threatening Council authority and social cohesion.

events.description: The BCI audit system outputs conflicting population totals. Thousands of names previously erased from watchlists reappear, sparking mass confusion and suspicion.
Citizens confront the Council, demanding answers about vanished relatives now showing as active in the BCI. Grief and anger erupt in several districts with unstable enforcement.
Daria Tomenko cross-checks archival logs and confirms many 'ghosts' were flagged as vanished months earlier, fueling protest movements and calls for full disclosure.
Council factions leak selective records. Petitions and riots surge citywide. BCI stability declines as mass protests challenge official narratives.
Citizens form local alliances—Archivists, Denialists, and Reclaimers—each seeking control over BCI records. The city divides along new lines, fracturing unity and Council legitimacy.
